summary: Completed frontend testing for Combined Electrolytes & Infusions Page. All 10 test cases PASSED. The new combined page successfully merges Electrolyte Correction and Infusion calculators into a single page at /children/infusions.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Combined page loads at /children/infusions route - PASSED
TEST 2: Weight input works and shows weight prominently (10 kg display) - PASSED
TEST 3: Three tabs exist (Electrolyte IV, Corrections, Drug Infusions) - PASSED
TEST 4: Electrolyte IV tab has 6 buttons (Ca Gluconate, KCl, MgSO4, NaHCO3, CaCl2, Addiphos) - PASSED
TEST 5: Clicking electrolyte button shows dose range and step-by-step calculation - PASSED
TEST 6: Corrections tab shows dose range in green box for each electrolyte - PASSED
TEST 7: Drug Infusions tab shows all 5 categories (Neuromuscular Blockade, Sedatives, Diuretics, Bronchodilators, Inotropic Support) - PASSED
TEST 8: Inotrope calculations work with weight (Dopamine, Dobutamine, Epinephrine, Norepinephrine) - PASSED
TEST 9: Floating nav bar electrolytes button navigates to /children/infusions - PASSED
TEST 10: Page header shows 'Electrolytes & Infusions' - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: ElectrolytesInfusionsPage.jsx: Well-structured combined page with 3 main tabs
Electrolyte IV tab: 6 buttons with detailed drug information, dose ranges (green), calculations, dilution instructions, compatibility info
Corrections tab: 6 sub-tabs (Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, NaHCO3, Sodium, Phosphate) each with dose range in green box
Drug Infusions tab: 5 categories with weight-based calculations showing Low/Med/High doses and mg/hr conversions
Weight input prominently displayed with real-time '10 kg' display on right side
data-testid attributes present: electrolyte-infusion-weight, btn-calcium-gluconate, btn-kcl, btn-mgso4, btn-nahco3, btn-cacl2, btn-addiphos, calc-* buttons
ChildrenDashboard.jsx: Widget title correctly shows 'Electrolytes & Infusions', floating nav bar electrolytes button navigates to /children/infusions
context_for_next_testing_agent: Combined Electrolytes & Infusions page verified at /children/infusions. Key features: 1) Three main tabs - Electrolyte IV (6 electrolyte buttons with detailed calculations), Corrections (6 sub-tabs with dose ranges in green boxes), Drug Infusions (5 categories including Inotropic Support with Dopamine/Dobutamine/Epinephrine/Norepinephrine), 2) Weight input at top with prominent display, 3) Floating nav bar electrolytes button (3rd button) navigates to this page, 4) Widget on Children dashboard shows 'Electrolytes & Infusions' title, 5) Page header shows 'Electrolytes & Infusions'. All calculations are weight-based and show dose ranges, dilution instructions, and administration details.
